but you're going to have to wait a little
longer...<end>

<yesno><break>

208851.「個人が 獲得した勝ち点の ランキングじゃ。\n<break>:
Individuals ranked by the number of points
they've scored...<break>

208852.「開催中の 対抗戦では\n このような順位になっておるぞ。\n<end>:
The standings in the ongoing rivalry look
like this...<end>

208854.「バトルトリニティとは……\n １チーム５人の クラブ別の３勢力に分かれ\n ジ:
What is Battle Trinity? Each team of five players is divided into three clubs, and they compete against each other for jewels. Before
each game, you must choose a special occupation, and you must use the characteristics of each occupation to fight
the enemy forces and collect as many Jewels as possible. The jewels you collect can be brought back to your team's Tri-lock for
scoring. The number of Triloks your team captures will also be added to your score after each game. The club with the most
points wins the game. It's a casual game for a large group. But it's still an ancient game. It's said to have its origins in
mythical times...

208855.「職業ランクとは……バトルトリニティの\n 競技用に使える職業の 熟練度のことじ:
Profession Rank... The level of proficiency of a profession that can be used to compete in Battle Trinity... There are three ranks...
As you accumulate proficiency points from your matches, your profession rank will increase. When you reach the maximum rank,
you'll receive special rewards and medals, so keep moving up the ranks. However... But even as you rise in rank, your strength in combat
remains the same. If you make a mistake...

208856.「練習試合とは……\n その名の通り 練習として\n 気楽に バトルトリニティを:
A practice match is... As the name suggests, it's a way to practice playing Battle Trinity... You can choose to play either with
your own club or with any club... If you choose "At My Club," you'll join your club and participate in the match... If you're in
a party, only the leader of the party can apply to join the game, and you'll be joining the leader's club... With "Any Club", you
join the team of the club that's available at the time, which often speeds up the matchmaking process...

208857.「はるか神話の時代……\n アストルティアには 雲に届くほど巨大な\n ５匹の霊:
In a mythical time... In Astrotasia, there were five beasts so large they could reach the clouds... The spirit beasts had a strong
fighting spirit... They would fight each other. And every time they did, mountains and islands were wiped out... And the goddess,
who could not bear to see this, said... "If you continue like this, the earth will disappear... I will give you a place to fight
and rules to follow. ..... And so the goddess gave five of them a place to fight... And three to fight... And they will fight each
other based on the number of gems they find. And the rules were... Do you understand? This was passed down to the present day, and the
rules were refined to create the Battle Trinity. The warriors of Battle Trinity, who fight by collecting jewels, seem to emit a
flash of light. That's why they're called Flash Hands.

208858.「模擬戦とは 対戦相手を指定して\n バトルトリニティの試合を行うことが\n で:
A Mock Battle is a Battle Trinity match where you can choose your opponent... You can enter a Mock Battle through your club's agents, or
you can choose an opponent to begin the match... You can only start a mock battle if you have three parties... Also note that you
can't play against the same club. There's no limit to the number of party members you can have, so it's possible to play an irregular
match... Mock battles don't unlock achievements or medals, and they don't give you job experience or reward items, so don't
forget...

208859.<select_se_off>\nバトルトリニティとは\n練習試合とは\n職業ラ:
<select_se_off>
About Battle Trinity
About Practice Game
About Vocation Rank
<select_end>
<break>

208861.「ジュエルとは その名の通り かがやく宝石。\n 戦場に 落ちているジュエルを:
Jewels, as the name implies, are the energy... You score points by placing jewels that have fallen on the battlefield into
trilocks. Each player can have up to five Jewels at a time, but if an enemy defeats you, you'll lose them all, so be careful.
When picked up, Jewels can restore HP and give you an advantage in a match...

208862.「トライロックとは…… 集めたジュエルを\n 納める チームの拠点となる場所じゃ:
What is Trilock? A team's base of operations where they store the jewels they've collected. There are seven Triloks on the
battlefield. You can't use them unless they're occupied, so you have to keep occupying them. If there's a Tri-Lock that's
not occupied, you go into the area, you build up your occupancy gauge, and then you take it. If there's a player from another club in
the area, the gauge will stop, so... If it's another club's Tri-lock, you can enter the area to reduce the occupancy gauge... Once
the gauge is depleted, you can return to neutral... Also, every time you deposit a Jewel into a Tri-Lock, you gain experience,
and once you have enough, your Tri-Lock will level up. The higher your Tri-Locke level, the harder it is for your base to be taken,
so it's best to deliver lots of Jewels... At the end of the game, you'll receive bonus points based on your Tri-Locke level, so make
sure you're not the last to be taken.

208863.「戦士 魔法使い 武闘家 盗賊など\n いくつかある 職業の中から\n 試合前に:
There are several professions, such as warriors, wizards, martial artists, and bandits, and you can choose your own before
the match. Each profession has its own set of rules, and each has its own status, such as movement speed... You'll learn more about
them when you play. Also, by picking up jewels and occupying trilocks, you'll gain experience, which will help you grow during
matches. If you can level up before the other players, you'll have a big advantage. If you fight with this in mind... But these levels
do not carry over to the next match. This is only for the duration of the match, so be careful.

208864.「モンスターのチカラを秘めた 玉のことじゃな。\n この援軍玉は バトルトリニテ:
A ball of monstrous power... Sometimes these balls of reinforcements are dropped during matches of Battle Trinity. You can only have
one reinforcements ball, and they can only be used in Trilock, but each one is very powerful... Also, if you defeat another Flash
who has a Reinforcements Ball, you can steal it from them, and defeat them before they can use it in Tri-Locke. A word of caution... If
you hold a reinforcements ball for any length of time, it will disappear. So it's best to use them right away.

208865.「ボーナスジュエルとは 試合中に入手できる\n レアなジュエルでな。トライロック:
Bonus Jewels are rare jewels that can be obtained during a match. If you put it in the Trilock, it will be appraised after the game
and you will be rewarded... The reward is given to everyone on the same team, so if you find a bonus jewel, you'll be glad you did.
But be careful, because you won't get rewarded if your contribution to the game is less than 300 points... Also, there's a limit
to the number of bonus jewels you can get depending on your ranking in a match... The more you win, the more you get...
Specifically... First place gets up to five, second and third place get up to three...

208867.「フォフォフォ……。\n わしは いつでも 見守っておる。\n おぬしに 輝ける:
Hohoho...
I'll always be watching over you. May the
glory of victory shine upon you.
<end>

210500.不明なエラーが発生しました。\nしばらく時間をおいてから\n再度お試しください。:
I'm getting an unknown error... Please wait a
moment and try again...<end>

210526.ここから 対抗戦の結果が\n確認できそうだ。\n<break>:
From here, you can see the results of the
rivalry...<break>

210527.バトルトリニティの優勝国に 贈呈される\n立派なトロフィーだ。\n<break>:
The magnificent trophy presented to the
winning nation of the Battle Trinity...<break>

211017.「対抗戦とは…… バトルトリニティならではの\n クラブ同士の威信をかけた 大会:
What is the Rivalry... It's a tournament of prestige... between the clubs of Battle Trinity. It's held periodically for a limited
time... When you win a match, you earn points for your club at the time of the match... The club with the most points by the end of the
period wins...

211018.「対抗戦に参加するには エントリー期間内に\n おぬしの所属する クラブのエージ:
In order to participate in the tournament, you must submit your entry through your club's agent during the entry period. Entry
can be made at any time during the preparation period and the competition period. And there's a fee to enter, but once
you've paid it, you're good to go for the whole tournament unless you change clubs.

211019.「対抗戦で 優秀な戦績を収めた 閃手には\n 参加費として集めた ゴールドが 授:
The flashers with the best results in the tournament will be awarded the gold that was collected for their participation. The more
flashers who participate, the more gold they receive... The gold will be distributed to the top 200 senpai in the all-club senpai
rankings, regardless of the winning club. Starting with the 4th tournament, an additional 1 million gold will be awarded in
addition to the prize money. However, the ranking is based on first-come, first-served. If more than one player has the same number
of points, the first player to be ranked will win the tournament. Even if you don't finish in the top 200, the flashers in the winning
club will receive a small reward for their contribution to the championship. I will award the prize money to each of the
flashers... The prize money will be awarded by me to each of the flashers, who will receive it during the next preparation
period. Remember, come to me...

211020.「ランキングには ３種類ある。\n クラブランキング。閃手ランキング。\n 優勝:
There are three types of rankings... Club Run... Sente Rank... The winner's club rankings... The club rankings are based on
the total number of points scored by each of the five clubs at the time... In the flashpoint ranking, the flashpoint player
with the most points against a club, regardless of the club he belongs to, is placed in the ranking... In the intra-club
flashpoint ranking, the top 200 flashpointers with the most points for the winning club are listed, and their names are engraved on a
trophy...

211021.「移籍とは 現在所属しているクラブではない\n 別のクラブに 入団しなおすことじ:
A transfer is when you join a different club than the one you currently belong to. You can transfer as many times as you like, for as
long as you want... However, you must be careful when transferring... If you want to participate in a rivalry game after
transferring, you have to pay the fee again... Also, between the rivalry and the off-season... In other words, you won't be
able to transfer to another club until the next preparation period, so be careful...

212059.「むう……対抗戦は\n 今 開催されていないので 教えられんのじゃ。\n<br>:
Mmm... The tournament isn't being held right now, so I can't tell you... For now, you can practice your skills and get ready for the
tournament...

212687.「何について 聞きたいのじゃ？\n<break>: What do you want to talk about?<break>

212822.「バトルトリニティは ３つの勢力で 得点を競い\n いちばん 多くの得点を 稼い:
Battle Trinity is a three-way battle for
points, and the club with the most points
wins.<bw_break>

212824.「得点を稼ぐには ジュエルという宝石を集めて\n 古戦場に ７つある トライロッ:
To score points, you need to collect gems called Jewels and place them in the seven Triloks, large crystals in the Old
Battlefield...

212826.「ジュエルには いろんな種類があって\n めずらしい色や形だと 高い得点になるん:
There are many different kinds of jewels, and
the more unusual the color or shape, the
higher the score...<bw_break>

212828.「中には 試合後に 報酬が手に入る\n ボーナスジュエル なんてものもあるぞい。:
Some of them are bonus jewels that reward you
after a match. When you find a Jewel, grab
it...<bw_break>

212830.「トライロックは 古戦場に ７つある。\n ジュエルを納めるには チームの拠点と:
Tri-Locke has 7... To deliver the jewels, we
need to occupy it as a team base...<bw_break>

212832.「占領するには 一定時間 トライロックのそばで\n 待っているだけでよい。占領し:
All you have to do is wait by the Trilock for a certain amount of time... Once occupied, all you have to do is deliver the jewels
you've collected and score...

212834.「占領したトライロックは 守っていないと\n 敵に奪われたりするぞ。試合後に 占:
Protect the Trirocks you capture or the enemy can take it. After the game, you get extra points based on the number of occupied
Trirocks, so defense is important.

212836.「他のクラブよりも たくさんのジュエルを集め\n 多くのトライロックを占領して:
If we can collect more jewels than any other
club, occupy more triloks, and deliver them,
then we'll win.<bw_break>

212838.「それと 古戦場では ジュエルとは別の\n 特別な玉が 見つかることがあるんじゃ:
Also, in the Old Battlefield, sometimes
you'll find special balls that aren't
jewels... I'll explain about these...<bw_break>

212840.「まずは お助けモンスターを呼ぶ 援軍玉じゃ。\n 使用すると モンスターがあら:
First, I'll call up a monster to help me.
Reinforcements... When you use it, a monster
will appear and help you in your match...<bw_break>

212842.「次は ジュエル得点がふえる 撃破玉。\n 相手を倒すと １つもらえ 個数に応じ:
Next, you get more jewels. When you defeat an opponent, you get one Jewel, and for each Jewel you defeat, you get an additional
point...

212844.「これらの玉を うまく使いこなせれば\n より勝利に近づくじゃろう。くわしい内容:
The better you use these balls, the closer
you are to victory. I'll tell you more about
it in "Listen to Me"...<bw_break>

212848.「最後に 職業についてじゃな。\n バトルトリニティでは 競技用となる\n ４つ:
And finally, professions... In Battle
Trinity, there are four competitive
professions to choose from...<bw_break>

212850.「戦士は 高いＨＰと 防御力をそなえた\n クラブの盾役じゃ。占領したトライロッ:
The warrior is a club shield with high hp and
defensive capabilities... ...to protect
occupied triloks and their allies...<bw_break>

212852.「魔法使いは うたれ弱いが 強力な範囲魔法で\n 相手を 一掃することができるん:
The wizard is vulnerable, but he can wipe out an opponent with his powerful ranged magic. It is important to be wise in the face of the
odds.

212854.「武闘家は すばやい連撃と 範囲攻撃をもち\n めいそうで 自分を回復できる万能:
The martial artist is a versatile fighter with a quick burst of fire, a ranged attack, and the ability to heal himself at will. He
can be used in any situation...

212856.「盗賊は 戦闘は苦手じゃが 素早さがウリじゃ。\n 戦いを避け たくさんジュエル:
Thieves aren't very good at fighting, but
they're fast. He avoids fights, collects lots
of Jewels, and helps the club win.<bw_break>

212858.「さて いろいろと説明したが 競技を覚えるなら \n 実際にやってみるのが 早か:
Now, I've explained a lot of things, but if you're going to learn how to play, it's best to try it for yourself. So let's have a go.
Are you ready?

212909.「ほう…… 勉強熱心なことじゃ。\n もう一度 遊び方を おさらいしたいのじゃな:
Ho... You're very studious... Would you like
to learn how to play again?<yesno 2><break>

215309.「ただし せっかく手に入れた ジュエルも\n トライロックに納めなければ 得点に:
But even with all the jewels you've acquired,
if you don't put them in the tri-lock, you
won't score any points...<bw_break>

215911.「試合中 ジュエルを持った敵を倒すと\n 撃破玉というものを 入手できるんじゃ。:
During a match, if you defeat an enemy with a Jewel, you'll get a Smash Ball. You can have up to three of these. When you have the
jewel, and you deposit it, it's automatically used. After that, it works for five seconds, so if you deposit it before that time...
You'll get extra points based on the number of jewels you have in your hand. Also, if you fall while holding a jewel, you'll lose the
jewel, so be careful.

215937.「フォフォフォ……あせるでない。\n まだ 対抗戦は はじまったばかりじゃから\:
Fofo... Oh, no... The tournament has just begun, so I can't show you the standings yet... I'm sure we'll be able to show you the
standings in the second half of the tournament, around the turn of the year, so I'll come back then...

215939.「対抗戦も もうじき 終わるのう……。\n というわけで 対抗戦が終わるまで\n:
The rivalry will soon be over... So, I won't tell you the rankings until the tournament is over... ... Are you kidding me? Fools...
It'll make the game more exciting...

215949.「フォフォフォ……。\n <%sM_Win_team>の クラブホームにある\n:
Hohoho... you would like to see the Winner's
Trophy at the <%sM_Win_team> Club Home?<yesno><break>

215953.「ほう……\n それでは <%sM_Win_team>の\n クラブホームへ 送:
Hmm.. Well then, I will return you to the
<%sM_Win_team> Club Home.
<end>

215967.「この前の対抗戦で\n <pc>が 獲得した勝ち点じゃ。\n<break>:
Last time we played against each other
<pc> The win that...<break>

218647.「フォフォ…… あせるでない。\n 対抗戦の勝ち点を 集計してる最中じゃ。\n<:
Fofo... I'm tired... I've been tallying up the points from the rivalry games. It'll be a while before we know... Until then, I'll
wait...

233817.「貢献度とは……\n どれだけ 勝利に貢献したかを表す 指標じゃ。\n<br>\:
Contribution is a measure of... It's a measure of how much you've contributed to a victory. You earn contribution points by
picking up jewels and capturing trilocks during matches. The points you earn in a match are accumulated as proficiency points
in your profession. In addition to that, contribution points earned during rivalries can also be used as Jewel Points that can be
exchanged for limited edition items. However... However... if you score less than 100 points in a match, your contribution
points will be reduced to zero...

243193.「クラブボーナスとは 勝ち点の総計にかかる\n ボーナス倍率のことじゃ。倍率によ:
A club bonus is a multiplier applied to the total number of points won... Depending on the multiplier, a club's points can
increase... However, the club bonus only affects the club ranking... It doesn't affect the player ranking... The bonus multiplier is
determined by the percentage of games played by each club, so the fewer games a club plays, the higher the multiplier. But there
is a limit to the bonus multiplier. So if a club has played more than three times as many games as the other clubs, they won't get a
higher multiplier. The bonus multiplier will be recalculated when the standings are updated. The scores in the standings are
multiplied by the club bonus multiplier... You can find out your club bonus by speaking to your club's agent... If you want to know
the multiplier for another club, you can come to me and I'll tell you. Fo-fo-fo...

<select_se_off>

245454.「今回の クラブボーナス一覧じゃ。\n ちなみに おぬしは 現在\n <%sM_:
This is the Club Bonus list. By the way, you
currently belong to the
<%sM_team> club.
<break>

253508.「貢献章という 新しい勲章が追加されたのじゃ。\n 所属クラブの勝ち点を １０点:
There's a new medal that's been added. It's called the "Contribution Medal"... You can earn the Medal of Merit by earning 10 points
for your club... If a player earns the Medal of Merit, he will be rewarded with a special prize. I want you to remember to come to me
after the match... This medal resets when the next tournament starts, so you can't set it... I'm just glad I have it.

257261.「できるだけ実力の近い 閃手同士が\n マッチングするように\n 内部レートが:
An internal rate has been introduced to match players as closely as possible... As you win or lose, the rates fluctuate. These rates are
used for matching purposes only, so players, including yourself, cannot see them. When you're in a party, the highest rate in that
party is used for matching. Between the hours of 2:30 a.m. and 4:00 p.m., when matching is less likely to occur, the internal rate is no
longer relevant, so remember...

286708.「第６回から 部門賞が追加されたぞい。\n 対抗戦の様々な戦績を参照して 部門別:
Starting with the 6th edition, we've added divisional awards. Trophies will be awarded to each division based on the various results of
the matchups. For now, there are five categories: "Strongman", "Contribution", "Scoring", "Flash Hand" and "Great Numbers".
The "Strongman" award goes to the club with the highest winning percentage. The "Contribution" award goes to the club with the
highest number of times in the top seven in the contribution ranking on the post-game results screen. The "Scoring" award goes to
the club that scores the most victory points in a game. The "Flash Hand" award goes to the club with the flash player who has scored the
most points. The "Great Numbers" award goes to the club with the highest percentage of participants in the rivalry. During the
off-season, the trophies for each division will be placed on a pedestal behind the agents. These trophies will be placed after
the results are announced until the next preparation period.
